text: Don Tale () is a 1964 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Fetin.«Путина знал ещё мальчишкой». Владикавказец в 90 лет тренирует детей в залеДОНСКАЯ ПОВЕСТЬ It stars Yevgeny Leonov, Lyudmila Chursina, and Aleksandr Blinov. == Actors == * Yevgeny Leonov as Yakov Shibalok * Lyudmila Chursina as Darya * Aleksandr Blinov as Nikolka * Boris Novikov as Ivan Chudukov * Nikolai Melnikov as Alyosha * Aleksey Gribov as Kuzmich (as A. Gribov) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1964 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Don Tale
